Articles.Content: i will fire millions of cows at the crater and make it my cowntain
I call McDonald's to turn your mad cowz into mad hamburgerz. My mountain

I hire 'muricans to eat all your burgers and clear up the mountain. 

My mountain.
Use the power of friendship magic to turn the mountain into a rainbow mountain, my rainbow mountain

> 
> Use the power of friendship magic to turn the mountain into a rainbow mountain, my rainbow mountain

I send the Red army to your rainbow mountain, to completely annihilate the brony-civilization and rise the scarlet banner in the ruins. 

My soviet hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2013-10-29T11:19:33Z" title="10/29/2013 11:19  AM" data-short="10 yr">October 29, 2013</time> by Stahlwerk**
  
Typo

Magic of Friendship overcomes the Haters, turning them into Bronies who share the Hill.

Our Hill

Sending some Reapers from Mass Effect there, simply killing everything in sight. Building lots of factories there, constructing even more Reapers.

My hill.
Commander Shepard sacrifice himself, the hill-memorial of Shepard

Everything change when the fire nation attacked. 

my burning hill
I tunnel under your hill and make a pit witch you fall in and die. Mah corgi hill
I flood the tunnel with acid, my corroded hill
I build a hill and it becomes Corgi paradise. My hill.
I buy the land on which the hill is located from the bank. My hill.
I buy the bank, my hill

I create a second GDR, capitalism & bank get annihilated. Hill is now publicly owned.

and I start producting raw spertra :3
